name: The Wave Rider
description:
The Wave Rider is a game where the Level progressively gets faster! And with this, so does the wave. Jump over the obsticals to keep the wave at bay! Hit 5 obsticals in a row and you will be engulfed by the tyrant Tsunami!

The world in which you play is randomly generated. So it is never the same the second time round! Have fun and don't forget to donate if you would like us to make this game into an epic platformer in the very near future! -The Development team, GrayLife Games.
